metadata.title: CVE-2024-38556 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/mlx5: Add a timeout to acquire the command queue semaphore Preventforced completion handling on an entry that has not yet been assigned anindex, causing an out of bounds access on idx = -22. Instead of waitingindefinitely for the sem, blocking flow now waits for index to be allocatedor a sem acquisition timeout before beginning the timer for FW completion.Kernel log example: mlx5_core 0000:06:00.0:wait_func_handle_exec_timeout:1128:(pid 185911): cmd[-22]:CREATE_UCTX(0xa04) No done completion

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
